items.name: Honour Call
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
12% increased Spell Damage
2% increased Cast Speed
7% increased maximum Life
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Armageddon Scar
enchantMods: Adds 8 Passive Skills
2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Physical Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Strength
1 Added Passive Skill is Force Multiplier
1 Added Passive Skill is Iron Breaker
1 Added Passive Skill is Master the Fundamentals
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Heart of Destruction if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

fracturedMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: Regenerate 0.1% of Life per Second
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.
